titles.title: To amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to require States to include under their State Medicaid plans coverage for medication-assisted treatment, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Ensuring Complete Coverage of Medication-Assisted Treatment Act
This bill requires coverage of medication-assisted treatment, which is used to treat substance-use disorders, under Medicaid.
